title: How to Do Cheats on Windows Pinball

steps.headline: Type in "Hidden Test" without any caps or quotes.
Click & drag the mouse to control the ball!
You have to type it fast.
Type in "bmax" without any caps or quotes.
When you lose, the ball flies out of the wormhole when you lose the ball!
Type in "rmax" without any caps or quotes.
Type in "gmax" without any caps or quotes.
You will be able to get the gravity well!
Now just keep moving your mouse side-to-side

text: Cheat 1: Hidden Test Type in "Hidden Test" without any caps or quotes.  Click & drag the mouse to control the ball!  You have to type it fast.  Cheat 2: Bmax Type in "bmax" without any caps or quotes.  When you lose, the ball flies out of the wormhole when you lose the ball!  Cheat 3: Rmax Type in "rmax" without any caps or quotes.  Your rank will increase!  Cheat 4: Gmax Type in "gmax" without any caps or quotes.  You will be able to get the gravity well!  Cheat 5: Points Type in "hidden test"  Go to the paddles  Now just keep moving your mouse side-to-side
